candidates.definition: Services provided by hotel staff to guests during their stay, including room maintenance, meals, and assistance.

positive_examples: The front desk clerk helped us check into our suite on the third floor.
Room service delivered our breakfast at exactly 8 AM as requested.
Housekeeping had already cleaned our room and turned down the beds when we returned.
I requested a wake-up call for 6:30 AM before my early flight.
The concierge arranged transportation to the airport for our checkout.
They brought fresh towels and restocked the minibar during turndown service.
negative_examples: The restaurant down the street serves excellent Italian food.
My car mechanic provided outstanding repair service last week.
The airline's customer service helped reschedule my cancelled flight.
We hired a cleaning service to deep clean our house monthly.
The hospital's emergency room provides 24-hour medical care.
Amazon's delivery service brought my package within two days.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: MedicalServices, AutomotiveServices, RestaurantServices, ConsultingServices

candidates.definition: Services that clean, wash, dry, or press clothing and textiles for customers

positive_examples: I need to drop off my suit at the dry cleaner before the wedding
The hotel offers laundry service for guest clothing
She runs a small business ironing shirts for busy professionals
The dry cleaning service removed the wine stain from my dress
We use a wash-and-fold service to handle our weekly laundry
The tailor shop also provides pressing services for formal wear
negative_examples: The house cleaning service vacuumed all the carpets
Professional window washers cleaned the office building
The janitor mopped the floors in the hallway
Car wash services include interior detailing
The maid service dusted all the furniture
Pool cleaning companies maintain residential swimming pools
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: RepairService, TransportationService, ConsultingService, MaintenanceService, DeliveryService

candidates.definition: Professional services provided to support commercial operations and business needs

positive_examples: The company hired a secretarial service to handle their correspondence and scheduling.
Executive lounge services included complimentary breakfast and meeting rooms for premium guests.
The office building offered photocopying services for all tenants on the third floor.
Our firm provides comprehensive commercial services including procurement and vendor management.
She worked for a business service provider that handled administrative tasks for small companies.
The hotel's executive floor services catered to business travelers with dedicated concierge support.
negative_examples: The restaurant provided excellent customer service during our dinner.
Emergency medical services arrived within minutes of the accident.
The city's public transportation service runs until midnight.
She volunteers at the local community service center on weekends.
The utility company's repair service fixed our broken water line.
Personal training services helped him achieve his fitness goals.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: PersonalServices, PublicServices, EmergencyServices, HealthcareServices
